optimization¶

A module to be used as a template when trying new optimization methods.

optimal_covering.optimization.clear_poly(dtime)¶

Get a Polygon which represents all clear area on Earth.

optimal_covering.optimization.cost(points, big_clear_poly)¶

Calculate the cost of a set of points, at a time where the clear area on Earth is represented by big_clear_poly

optimal_covering.optimization.optimize()¶

Perform some optimization operation.

optimal_covering.optimization.random_points()¶

Make some random set of points.
